# UnitMaster.io - AI Context

## Site Description
UnitMaster is a privacy-focused, client-side utility toolkit for PDF manipulation, image editing, and unit conversion.
It runs entirely in the browser using WebAssembly (WASM), ensuring user data is never uploaded to a server.

## Key Capabilities (Tools)
- **PDF Tools**: Merge, Split, Compress, Sign (eSignature), Redact (Privacy), PDF to Word (OCR), PDF to Image, Image to PDF.
- **Image Tools**: Remove Background (U-2-Net), Converter, YouTube Thumbnail Downloader.
- **Unit Connecters**: High-precision math for Length, Mass, Digital Storage, Temperature, etc.

## Navigation Structure
- `/tools/pdf/[tool-name]`: Direct access to PDF tools.
- `/tools/image/[tool-name]`: Direct access to Image tools.
- `/[category]/[from-to-to]`: Direct access to unit conversions (e.g. `/digital/terabyte-to-bit`).

## Technical Stats
- **Privacy**: Local-first / Offline-capable.
- **Speed**: Static generation + Edge caching.
- **Pricing**: Free tier (unlimited basic use) + Pro tier (batch processing, encrypted files).
